name: Klutter Inc
description: Developer of a goods comparison platform designed to find out discount deals and offers on consumer durables. The company's platform offers complete transparency by instantly showing shopping options across all retail marketplaces including new, used, refurbished, rental, unbranded and in-store, enabling consumers to compare prices, shop across marketplaces, and maximize savings by making better buying decisions.
one_liner: Developer of a goods comparison platform designed to find out discount deals and offers on consumer durables. The company's platform offers complete transparency by instantly showing shopping options across all retail marketplaces including new, used, refurbished, rental, unbranded and in-store, enabling consumers to compare prices, shop across marketplaces, and maximize savings by making better buying decisions.
